sentences.en: ‘The man is a genius,’ marvelled Claire.
sentences.cn: “这人是个天才。”克莱尔赞叹道。

sentences.en: " My! Dat's a mighty gay marvel, I tell you!
sentences.cn: “ 嘿, 老实说, 那是个挺不错的好玩意.

sentences.en: A new technological marvel was invented at Cambridge University in England, the scanning electron microscope.
sentences.cn: 一项科技新奇迹在英国剑桥大学诞生了——这就是扫描电子显微镜。
人人对他的勇气都惊叹不已。

sentences.en: He is a marvel of patience.
His eyes meanwhile were at liberty to examine Mr. Marvel's dusty figure.
sentences.cn: 他顺便打量了一下马弗尔先生满身尘土的样子.

sentences.en: I marvel at the felicity of his style.
sentences.cn: 我惊叹他的精巧的文体.

sentences.en: I marvel how it can be so.
sentences.cn: 我感到惊异,事情怎会如此.

sentences.en: It was a marvel that the floor never gave way.
sentences.cn: 惊奇的是地板居然从未塌陷。

sentences.en: Niagara Falls is one of the greatest marvel in the world.
sentences.cn: 尼亚加拉瀑布是世界大奇景之一.

sentences.en: She's marvel to be able to shoot with such accuracy.
sentences.cn: 她的枪法那么好,真不简单.

sentences.en: The foreign tourists marvel at the fine view of the West Lake.
sentences.cn: 外国旅游者惊叹西湖的优美景色.
大自然的 / 技术的奇迹

sentences.en: The policeman gripped the wrist of the invisible hand that collared Marvel.
sentences.cn: 警察抓到了拉住马弗尔衣襟的那只看不见的手.

sentences.en: The robot is a marvel of modern engineering.
sentences.cn: 机器人是现代工程技术的奇迹.

sentences.en: The tourists marvel at the beauty of the lake.
sentences.cn: 游客们惊叹这条湖的美丽.

sentences.en: The whale, like the dolphin, has become a symbol of the marvels of creation.
sentences.cn: 鲸，和海豚一样，已经成为造物杰作的象征。

sentences.en: Yet so eccentric that all marvel at her.
You're a marvel; how can you work so hard at your age.
sentences.cn: 您是一位奇才; 象您这么大年纪的人怎么会这么拼命干呢.

words.tran_cn: 了不起的；非凡的；令人惊异的；不平常的
奇迹般地；不可思议地；令人惊讶地

trans.tran_cn: 奇迹，令人惊奇的事物（或事例）
trans.tran_en: a wonderful and surprising person or thing
to be very surprised or impressed by sth
